content: **easy to work shawl based on a pretty leaf pattern with two different construction methods to choose from both versions are particularly well suited for working with a limited or unknown amount of yarn since you start at one point and increase from there until you either run out of yarn or out of patience ** this pattern recipe has been originally published in my blog under the title bottom-up birch the revised version contains nicer charts and now has instructions and charts for a sideways construction too there is also a french translation available thanks to anneniva 1 download the word document from her blog at dansmestiroirs canalblog com 2 merci beaucoup alix pour attirer mon attention sur le traduction 1 http //www ravelry com/people/anneniva 2 http //dansmestiroirs canalblog com/archives/2009/03/10/12900434 html
